languages.text:
"Презрев закон Комморры вековой
И разорив руины Крудараха,
В свой дом трофей запретный принесла,
Ведома жадностью, Хозяйка бурь.
Хоть и страшится Темный город тех,
Чьи души ярким пламенем сияют,
Презрет запрет, нарушен уговор,
Комморра ждет, Комморра рок вкушает.
Чтоб превратить ход драмы в фарс, идут
На сцену два неназванных актера.
Один — танцор, певец, смутьян и плут,
Другой — мон-кай, убийца, пленник вора".

"Commorragh's ancient law was boldly spurned,
And too despoiled were Crudarach's remains,
The Tempest's mistress, spurred by avarice,
Forbidden plunder brought to her dark nest.
And though the City shrinks from those whose souls
In darkness gleam with coruscating flame,
The interdict is scorned, the pact ignored,
Commorragh waits, Commorragh tastes its doom.
To make of drama farce beyond belief,
A pair uncredited assume the stage:
A cutthroat mon-keigh, captive of a thief;
A dancer, makestrife poet, guileful knave."
languages.original_text:
"Презрев закон Комморры вековой
И разорив руины Крудараха,

languages.text:
“科摩罗的古老律法已无人在乎，
克鲁达拉赫的遗骸已疮痍满目。
暴风的女主人，因为贪婪而变得盲目，
禁忌的战利品，被运往她阴暗的门户。
黑暗中腐朽的灵魂，散发着炽热的烈焰，
让这座城市在恐惧中停驻。
禁令遭到蔑视，契约为人轻侮。
科摩罗等待着，品尝它的末路。
一对无名之人登上了舞台，
让这场闹剧变得惊世骇俗。
一个是嗜血的猴子，窃贼的俘虏，
一个是舞蹈家、诗人，卑劣之徒。”
languages.original_text:
"Commorragh's ancient law was boldly spurned,
And too despoiled were Crudarach's remains,
The Tempest's mistress, spurred by avarice,
Forbidden plunder brought to her dark nest.
And though the City shrinks from those whose souls
In darkness gleam with coruscating flame,

To make of drama farce beyond belief,
A pair uncredited assume the stage:
A cutthroat mon-keigh, captive of a thief;
A dancer, makestrife poet, guileful knave."

languages.text:
«La antigua ley de Commorragh se quebró,
al igual que los restos de Crudarach se saquearon.
La dama de la tormenta, a la que la avaricia impulsó,
trasladó un botín prohibido a su oscuro antro.
Y aunque la Ciudad da la espalda a las almas
que arden en las sombras con llama iridiscente,
el interdicto está profanado, el pacto, en migajas,
y Commorragh espera, Commorragh el fin presiente.
Para hacer de la obra una inverosímil farsa,
una pareja sin nombre sube al escenario:
{mf|el|la} despiadad{mf|o|a} mon-keigh, con las manos atadas;
el bailarín, poeta improvisado y astuto bellaco».
languages.original_text:
"Commorragh's ancient law was boldly spurned,
And too despoiled were Crudarach's remains,
The Tempest's mistress, spurred by avarice,
Forbidden plunder brought to her dark nest.

languages.text:
「コモラフの古代の掟は大胆に拒絶され
クルダラの名残は強奪されつくされ
嵐の愛人は欲望に駆られ
禁じられた略奪が彼女の暗い巣に持ち込まれた
暗闇で灼熱の炎で輝くそれらの魂で
街は縮小していくが
禁令は軽蔑され、盟約は無視され
コモラフは街、コモラフは破滅を味わう
想像を絶する茶番劇を作るため
無名の二人組が舞台に立つ：
泥棒の捕虜にされた、熾烈なモン＝ケイ
踊り子、詩人の先導者、狡猾な悪漢」
languages.original_text:
"Commorragh's ancient law was boldly spurned,
And too despoiled were Crudarach's remains,
The Tempest's mistress, spurred by avarice,
Forbidden plunder brought to her dark nest.

To make of drama farce beyond belief,

A cutthroat mon-keigh, captive of a thief;

languages.text:
"Commorraghs altes Gesetz — kühn verschmäht.
Zu stark geplündert Crudarachs Reste.
Die Herrin des Sturms, von Gier getrieben,
verbotene Beute bringt in ihr Nest.
Die Stadt verschmäht alle, deren Seele
in Dunkelheit strahlt mit Funkelflamme.
Gebot und Pakt verschmäht und ignoriert,
Commorragh wartet, kostet sein Ende.
Aus Drama zu machen unbänd'ge Farce,
betritt ein Paar die Bühne, ungenannt:
Ein Chem-Pan-Sey, eines Diebs Gefang'ner;
Ein Tänzer, zänkischer Dichter, Knappe."
languages.original_text:
"Commorragh's ancient law was boldly spurned,
And too despoiled were Crudarach's remains,
The Tempest's mistress, spurred by avarice,

languages.text:
« La loi antique de Commorragh fut rejetée audacieusement
Et les vestiges de Crudarach, spoliés si sévèrement.
Poussée par l'avarice, la maîtresse de la Tempête
Emporta un butin interdit dans sa sombre cachette.
Et bien que la cité se tasse sous le poids de ceux dont l'âme
Brille dans les ténèbres d'une puissante flamme,
L'interdiction est bafouée, le passé ignoré,
Et Commorragh attend, goûtant son destin brisé.
Pour transformer un drame en comédie,
Un duo imprévu monte sous les projecteurs :
{mf|Prisonnier|Prisonnière} d'un voleur, {mf|un|une} impitoyable mon-keigh ;
Et un danseur, poète agitateur et fripon trompeur. »
languages.original_text:
"Commorragh's ancient law was boldly spurned,
And too despoiled were Crudarach's remains,
The Tempest's mistress, spurred by avarice,
Forbidden plunder brought to her dark nest.
And though the City shrinks from those whose souls
In darkness gleam with coruscating flame,
The interdict is scorned, the pact ignored,
Commorragh waits, Commorragh tastes its doom.
To make of drama farce beyond belief,
A pair uncredited assume the stage:
A cutthroat mon-keigh, captive of a thief;
A dancer, makestrife poet, guileful knave."

languages.text:
"Commorragh'ın kadim yasası küstahça sayıldı hiçe,
Crudarach'tan kalanlar yağmalandı, çevrildi piçe,
Kasırga'nın başındaki hırstan gözü dönen Arkoniçe,
Topladı yasaklı ganimetini, getirdi kara inine.
Karanlıkta ruhu parlayanların alevi,
Tehdit altında bıraksa da koca Şehri,
Küçümsedi yasağı, görmezden geldi ahdi.
Bekliyor Commorragh büyük felaketi.
Güldürüye döndürmek için bu trajik piyesi,
Beklenmedik bir çift adım atar sahneye:
Katil bir mon-keigh, hırsızdır sahibi;
Düzenbaz bir dansçı ki soksun araya fitneyi."
languages.original_text:
"Commorragh's ancient law was boldly spurned,
And too despoiled were Crudarach's remains,
